items.sentence: I won't tell you anything until I get some sleep.
If Tom is too busy I'll drive you to the airport.
This isn't the first time that I've been bullied.
Tom told me that he had a rare medical condition.
Tom's new album is set to be released in October.
Tom was one of the soldiers we met the other day.
It doesn't look like Tom is having very much fun.
Tom didn't say anything, but just shook his head.
I haven't seen Tom today and I hope that I don't.
I'm sure Tom would love to go to Boston with you.
